newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - Current Australian Takeovers (P to Z) - Oct 21.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - Current Australian Takeovers (P to Z) - Oct 21.

text.p: TERMS: Four shares in the offeror for each share held
and three shares in the offeror for every two options held.
NOTES: Offeror proposes to acquire all the issued
capital of the offeree. The offer will be conditional upon 90 percent acceptance and the necessary regulatory approvals in Canada and Australia and the approval of Mineral Resources
TERMS: Nine shares in IAMA for every 10 shares held in
NOTES: IAMA holds about 16.81 percent of Primac's
issued capital. Bid is conditional on 90 percent acceptance. Directors recommend shareholders take no action although they note the bid appeared totally inadequate.
OFFEROR: KPN Australia Ltd (a Wholly owned subsidiary of Royal PTT Nederland NV
TERMS: A$2.45 cash per ordinary share and A$2.45 cash
NOTES: The bid is conditional on 90 percent acceptance

from 75 percent of offerees and approval of appropriate regulatory authorities in relevant jurisdictions including Australia and Europe. KPN is currently entitled to 14.9 percent of the issued capital of TNT.
TERMS: A$2.30 cash per share ex-dividend and 15 cents
NOTES: Directors recommend shareholders not sell their
shares pending further advice. Offeror is now entitled to 97 percent of the issued capital of the offeree and will proceed to compulsory acquisition.
TERMS: A$5.30 per share (ex-dividend), raised from
NOTES: Offer conditional on 90 percent acceptance and
the All Ordinaries index not falling below 2000 points. Directors advise shareholders to reject the advised offer. Offeror is entitled to 18.97 percent of offeree.
